scenario_text.value: There’s no sign of Haru or Miyuki here.

Really? Where could they have been taken off
to? This is so frustrating!

And we need to find them right away, or who
knows what the enemy might do to them.

What do you think, Takuma? Do you think
they’re still okay?
Are Haru and Miyuki all right?
Probably.
We’ll find them.
Maybe not.
Probably.
That’s, uh, not very reassuring.

They went after Miyuki specifically. They
must want her for something.

So I don’t think they’d just kill her. Not
right away, at least.
What about after they get what they want?

We’ll find her before that happens. That’s
all we can hope for.

With all of us looking this hard, I’m sure
we’ll find them before anything bad happens.
I don’t know...

What we need to do right now is keep looking
and hope. It’s okay. We’re going to make it.
That’s right! Let’s keep at it, Aoi!
Yeah, you’re right.
We...might be too late.

Takuma, what’s gotten into you? Since when
have you been such a pessimist?

I’m just saying we’ve looked really hard,
and we haven’t found anything.

We may need to prepare ourselves for the
worst.
Yeah, maybe you’re right.
Not you too, Aoi!

Anyway, all we can do right now is keep
looking.

I appreciate you being so thorough, Takuma,
but Haru and Miyuki aren’t here.

Let’s look somewhere else! Aoi and I were
just talking about where we should try next.
Got it. I’ll head somewhere else, then.
